TEXT.TITLE: KRAFT <KRA> COMPLETES FROSTEX ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Kraft Inc said it completed the acquisition of Frostex Foods Inc for undisclosed terms. Kraft said last month it had signed a letter of intent to acquire the Austin, Texas-based foodservice distributor. Reuter
